thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Paige Agrella

author: Paige Agrella
title: Paige Agrella
text: Ez Cater is an incredible company run by a team of very helpful and friendly people. They take any potential concern off of the customer to communicate with restaurants and even find replacement caterers if a caterer falls through. The website offers a very wide variety of caterers and there are multiple facets to organize the options however you'd like. I'm always very impressed and reassured with their professionalism and the accommodating nature of the staff.
